website_summaries.verdict: Another fireclay sink favorite, this product showcases trim, squared edges for a clean and simple look.
pros: Does not require a flange extension with assembly
Identical design on front and back for painless drain installation
cons: A few customers complained that their sink came in an irregular shape or bowed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!  Heavy!  Reversible.
customer_reviews.text: This review is on behalf of my wife who is the driving force behind this purchase. Even so, I'm very happy with the sink. It's beautiful and the contractor liked that it did not have predefined orientation for installation. The front and the back are identical, so the drain can be installed on the left or the right. Note: This sink is over a hundred pounds and will require some bracing to hold it in place. Also, be very cautious about moving it solo as it's not easy to lift with good form. I have not attempted to move it at all due to physical limitations, but have observed several others doing so.
customer_reviews.author: The Beverly’s

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't drain well
customer_reviews.text: We've had this sink for about 6 months now. It is rock solid (and weighs accordingly!) and still looks great. We bought the insert rack and so with that, we have not had any dents or scratches. My only issue with it is that it does not have enough pitch to allow food to easily go down the drain into the disposal. I end up chasing food around with the faucet for quite some time (which wastes precious CA water) or I have to lift up the rack and push everything down. Otherwise, it is a perfect sink.
customer_reviews.author: Denisea

customer_reviews.title: Loving it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink! We get so many compliments on it. I was a little worried not really knowing for sure about it. Plus it sat in the box for months before it got installed. It has the slightest of bow on one of the long sides but since it we did an under the sink mount, you can't even tell. Been using it for over three months now...no scratches, chips or stains. Seems really well made.
customer_reviews.author: harshnw

customer_reviews.title: I’d choose this again for sure!!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this sink four years ago. I love it!! It’s huge. Perfect for washing my small dog—so much easier on my back than the bath tub. I did get the wire insert to protect the sink from dishes and the dishes from the sink. I agree with another reviewer that for some reason it’s hard to get small food items to drain out. Is that all sinks but I never noticed it??? The sink cleans beautifully with a light scrub. I purchased a standard plastic tub to fill with hot soapy water for hand washing dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Anna from CA

customer_reviews.title: Great sink, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so does everyone who sees it. Even the other contractors were oohing and ahhing over it. And the price was better than I saw elsewhere. Only issue I have is the sink protector made for it is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: ValerieD

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this sink
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sink. I receive so many compliments on this. The only problem i have is that the sink is so large i cant have a garbage disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Kasprzyk

customer_reviews.title: I have brought from Barclay before was very happy with the things for my bathroom I got from ...
customer_reviews.text: brought to go in my kitchen, I haven't had it installed yet, remodling kitchen.. I have brought from Barclay before was very happy with the things for my bathroom I got from them.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: In pieces when I open the package. I sent it back, it worries me a out durability for future use so I going with a different option.
customer_reviews.author: Boblawblaw

customer_reviews.title: The kitchen sink too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this great sink and had it shipped to my home, when I arrived home the day it was delivered I found it just (barely) inside the door to the garage in a box that was split down the side and had gravel (from our driveway) packed into the split edge of the box. I was sure that the sink would be in more pieces than my favorite jigsaw puzzle...... BUT, it had been so well packed that it was completely undamaged. The sink itself is just as advertised and absolutely beautiful I cannot wait to install it in my new farmhouse kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Myers

customer_reviews.title: Love my sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is gorgeous. It does require regular cleaning to look good - stains easily. I bought the wire rack to prevent scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I chose this sink. It's perfect! My kitchen would not be the same without it. Well worth paying extra for something like this:)
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink. Very well made. Just the right size - not too large. Would buy Barclay products again - but only directly from Amazon not via a third-party.
customer_reviews.author: Gardening 1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and solid craftsmanship! Looks fantastic and have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: TxAGGIE'00

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This sink is perfect! I did purchase the Grid that goes inside and am so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Retirednhappy

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this sink
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this sink, and think its just amazing! It did require additional supports built into the cabinet, due to its weight (125+ lbs). However, this was a simple fix.
customer_reviews.author: Hotmanda

customer_reviews.title: The Best sink
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink, great addition to our kitchen. This sink is deep enough to hold pasta pots and tons of stuff. It is nice to have one giant sink rather than two small sides. I hate navigating over the middle. This offers you plenty of space to what you need and if you need two sinks for some reason, just a a small tub to it and you have two. I love this sink.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Livermore

customer_reviews.title: Love that the drain can go on either side and ...
customer_reviews.text: This sink is Gorgeous and worth every penny. Love that the drain can go on either side and its just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee B. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Will use this vendor again.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. As advertised. Name brand at 1/2 the cost.
customer_reviews.author: bfrazr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, very solid. Received many compliments. Love it and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Farm House Sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful sink. Arrived without damage and was easy for my contractor to install. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink. The first was cracked but they immediately replaced it. PRETTY!
customer_reviews.author: Kianna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It came a bit banged up. Scuffs from the box that I had to use some elbow grease to polish out. It's awesome tho and in great shape
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a great looking sink and as uniform as you would expect in a clay product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sink, we ordered the wrong size though. Seller was easy to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Beth N

customer_reviews.title: farmhouse kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOOOOVVVVVVeeeeeee this sink!!! It reminds me of my home in England when I was a little girl. I used to help my mother in the kitchen and we had a sink like this. It's just the right size for all the food prep and cooking that I like to do. The only thing I might change is the position of the drain. I would put it in the middle so all the crap can be swept into it and the faucet, being directly over the drain can whoosh it all away. Other than that, it's beautiful and I love it. Did I mention that I love it? Thank you. Flick
customer_reviews.author: Flick

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink installed. Only after thought is I wish the underside was finished because it hangs over the cabinet slightly. You can only tell it’s unfinished if you’re on your hands and knees but I know it’s there. Overall great product and price.
customer_reviews.author: es123

customer_reviews.title: We loved it in our last house and are looking forward ...
customer_reviews.text: We’ve bought two of these now. We loved it in our last house and are looking forward to having it installed in our new one. You may want to purchase an extended flange for the drain installation. Not totally required, but it gives more room to work with.
customer_reviews.author: H. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: We love this sink
customer_reviews.text: We love this sink! Delivery was quick and there were no issues. Our contractor installed so cannot speak to that but it looks beautiful in our kitchen. I waffled a bit on center vs offset drain location and I am glad we chose the off-center, makes it easier to have a full sink on one side and use the sprayer to direct everything one way vs trying to aim at the middle. We also bought the grate on Amazon and I really think it will help preserve the life of the sink. It has been about 8 months and we have had no problems with chipping/staining/etc. Picture quality is not great but for reference cabinet color is BM Simply White.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but irregular
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty, but it's irregular - the bottom isn't square, and the back side has a slump. For a sink this price they should have a better process and/or QA.
customer_reviews.author: YoPedal!

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had expected after just a few years
customer_reviews.text: Easily scratched and pits some. The bottom is just full of scratches and I am careful in putting in items. Wish I had bought a better sink.
customer_reviews.author: She cooks healthy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Sink
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sink from another retailer and am very happy with it. It looks beautiful, it's very large and it's so functional. This sink is an excellent value for the money. Most other farm sinks are closer to $1,000+. The sink was very easy for my cabinet maker to build a custom cabinet for, and my contractor installed it with no problems. Completes the look of my the kitchen in my 1928 house. I do recommend getting the grate to prevent scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Laura George

product_meta.title: Barclay FS30 Fire Clay Farmer Sink, White
